title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-confetti
author: oeyoews
name: neotw-confetti
readme:
!! Examples
<$confetti text="🔊 sound" type="centerSound"/> <$confetti text="🔥 fireworks" type="fireworks"/> <$confetti text="🎉 pride" type="pride"/> <$confetti text="🌨️ snow" type="snow"/> <$confetti text="🎉 realistic" type="realistic"/> <$confetti text="🍾 msg" type="msg"/> <$confetti text="🎲 random" type="random"/> <$confetti text="🎲 center" type="center"/>
!! with action-sendmessage ```wikitext <$button message="om-confetti-launch"> 🔊 Click Me or <$button> <$action-sendmessage $message="om-confetti-launch"/> 🔊 Click Me ``` <$button message="om-confetti-launch"> 🔊 Click Me
